divs: Sighting DetailsJet from sjafb was seen flying at a high rate of speed from south to north.Jet appeared to pull up and a green streak of light gained on the jet very quickly. Once it caught up with the jet it turned into a ball of white light or it was some type of spotlight from the plane. Both appeared to leave the area quickly.
Summary: appeared to be like a green flare of some type that followed a sjafb jet
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pikeville
This sighting has never been favorited.
